title: Roasted Pepper Salad
introduction: Roasted Pepper Salad is a versatile dish perfect for various occasions. Whether served as part of an antipasto assortment, paired with grilled tuna or pork, or accompanied by sliced fresh mozzarella, this salad offers a delightful combination of flavors.

ingredients.description: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

instructions: Toss the peppers with the oil, basil, garlic, and salt and pepper to taste.
